PageTitle: display ftp server ip auth-fail information
FuncDef: The display ftp server ip auth-fail information command displays the information of the FTP auth-failed IP addresses of a user. The display ftp server ip auth-fail information command displays the information of the FTP auth-failed IP addresses of a user.
CLIs: display ftp server ip auth-fail information
Examples: <HUAWEI> display ftp server ip auth-fail information
ExtraInfo: The display ftp server ip auth-fail information command displays the information of the FTP auth-failed IP addresses. The command output includes the names of VPN instances to which the IP addresses belong, IP address status, numbers of authentication failures, and the IP addresses that fail to pass FTP authentication will not be adopted to make invalid authentication.
